snippet: The "super PAC," which supports Mitt Romney, purchases $3.6 million in additional in advertising in Florida.
abstract: The "super PAC," which supports Mitt Romney, purchases $3.6 million in additional in advertising in Florida.
lead_paragraph: A group backing Mitt Romney has purchased $3.6 million in additional advertising in Florida, a person with knowledge of the decision said Tuesday, the building blocks of a television firewall intended to guarantee that no other Republican makes it past the state's critical primary at the end of the month.

headline.main: Restore Our Future Makes New Ad Buy
